about_the_game:
DLC 3 Need In Speed

In order to run DLC3, we need have main part of Dead Line、DLC1 and DLC2.

Open the fourth level ，Added a new map， Extend the follow-up story

Location:Station Platform
Objective:Chase Robert

Storm Team traced M and R to the station platform and found the target was hidden inside the train. The squad was fighting along the platform, rushed into the carriage, and eliminated M after a sneak attack. After all, Storm Team surrounded R and ordered him to surrender. Suddenly, a flash beat the squad, and R ran away, leaving only a none stop time bomb.

DLC 3 Need In Speed

Location:Station Platform

Storm Team traced M and R to the station platform and found the target was hidden inside the train. The squad was fighting along the platform, rushed into the carriage, and eliminated M after a sneak attack. After all, Storm Team surrounded R and ordered him to surrender. Suddenly, a flash beat the squad, and R ran away, leaving only a none stop time bomb.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: I5 3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7 Windows10
  • Processor: I7 4790
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
